body:
Hi,

Thank you for your interest in Oracle HCM Cloud. The links and information that you requested are below/
•         Learn more about HCM Cloud - https://bit.ly/hcmmore
•         Gartner, Magic Quadrant for Cloud HCM Suites for Midmarket and Large Enterprises - https://bit.ly/hcmarep2 
•         Human Capital Management Cloud Using Analytics and Reports Whitepaper - https://bit.ly/hcmwp
•         Listen how Annika Lindholm, Global HR Owner, Skanska, a leading construction group, discusses how they leveraged the power of HCM Cloud - https://bit.ly/hcmstories 
•         Listen to Oracle SVP, HCM Product Marketing, Emily He discuss the biggest focus areas for HR in the year ahead YouTube - https://bit.ly/hcmvideos


Thank you,
Oracle team
